oai_dc:dc.dc:title: U-Compare speech synthesis and visualisation workflow
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a workflow that is designed especially for use in the UIMA-based U-Compare workbench (see separate META-SHARE record). The workflow is in "ucz" format (specific to U-Compare) and can be imported via the "Import Workflow" item in the "Workflows" menu of the U-Compare interface. It includes the "Synthesizer Annotator" component (based on the Ogimios speech synthesis software, developed at Universitat PolitÃ¨cnica de Catalunya) and the "Synthesizer Annotation Viewer" component, developed at the University of Manchester. The latter component provides a visualisation of the speech signals and transcriptions of individual words.
